review: I managed to purchase a refurbished unit for $85, and this is the best upgrade for a home theater pc. The response time is good, and variety of apps are great. Obviously, you have good integration with all things Amazon. My only knock is not having the vudu app on here. I'm also hoping to see the Sling TV supported on this device. The form factor is small, and since the unit uses a bluetooth remote that doesn't require line of sight, I've mounted the Fire TV behind by TV.
